name: Tikky Takky x4
description:
This is a simple two player Tic Tac Toe game with a slightly different map shape.  

Each player takes turns and presses the key corresponding to where they want to place their symbol (x or o).  You can see in the screenshots that the available keys and slots are q,w,e,r and a,s,d,f and z,x,c,v.
